titleStmt.title: England's petition to the two houses assembled in Parliament, or, An Humble petition of the distressed and almost destroyed subjects of England to the two houses, containing (in the judgment of the wise) the very sense of all the truehearted of the kingdom ... / N.R.
titleStmt.author: N. R.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: ink show-through, pages stained with loss of print.
Signed: "Your fellow subjects throughout the whole kingdom".
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
